content.content: 1727×624 44.6 KB  Hi everyone, thanks for checking out the State of Dai. Now separate from the Weekly Relay with the objective to scale and improve all the information you need for your Dai escapades! Disclaimer: This update is assembled by a group of contributing members in the MakerDAO community. This does not serve as financial advice or an inducement to vote in any specific way. This update is for information and communication purposes only.  Hey, you! Yes, you. We asked. We still have a couple of questions! Very Short Feedback Survey  The public PDF version is available here.    Peg873×611 67.6 KB   Transitioning into June saw very little deviation off the peg.   24 hour versus 7 day1024×802 463 KB   Max and min at 1.06 and .89.   DAI Supply1365×750 88.1 KB   Slightly less TVL this past week at 10.6 billion (~300 million less). A few large GUNI mints.   Mins/burns745×603 45.4 KB   148 million in DAI mints on less overall debt momentum than usual.   Weekly vault changes1184×899 149 KB   Weekly vaults are trending towards the opening. ETH-C and WBTC-C are top gainers. WSTETH-B is picking up six new vaults.    Though staked ETH B grabbed new positions, the top 10 vaults are 96% of the outstanding debt.    Unique borrowers across DeFi last week going to Aave. Surprisingly more than last week, alongside a reduction in Uniques here at Maker and Compound.  Visit Makerburn for an up-to-the-minute breakdown of changes, expenses, and Ilk updates.   For vaults at risk, Medium risk has been growing.   20% or more1131×402 58.9 KB   Over 21% drawdown and vaults start to get risky. Real cascades begin at 26% drawdown.  daistats.com | makerburn.com | maker.blockanalitica.com  Credit @twblack88
